description: Bersiba was an ancient site in Syria, inhabited as early as the Neolithic period. To the Hittites the site was known as Masuwari.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tell Ahmar SYR

names.description: Assyrian name of Til-Barsip. A place name from the TAVO Index (Vol. 2, p. 877).
names.details: The name should probably be read as Kār-Salmānu-ašarēd, rather than as Kār-Šulmānu-ašarēd (the traditional reading of the name); the cuneiform sign DI is to be read as sál instead of šùl. GANE OBJECT 32278
